title: Amelia Earhart Documentary Collection
description:
This is a collection of documentaries I put together so that I could learn as much as there was to know about the Pioneeress of Aviation, Amelia Earhart. The older ones largely contain inaccurate and outdated information where suppositions and theories are used, but still contain factual information not included in the others. Still worth the watch :) If you decide to only watch one, try "Finding Amelia Earhart", as it's the most recent and confirms/expels theories mentioned in the first three.

More info on the search for Amelia and her missing aircraft can be found by googling: TIGHAR The Earhart Project

Torrent Contents:

Amelia Earhart The Price of Courage (TV) [1993] PBS

The Final Hours - Amelia Earharts Last Flight [2000]

The Amelia Earhart Conspiracy - The True Story [National Geographic 2007]

Finding Amelia Earhart [Discovery Channel 2012] (Features the Niku VI expedition by the TIGHAR team. More info on this expedition and its findings can be found by googling 'Niku VI')

Earhart Last Flight Footage.rm (RealMedia) - Raw-footage scenes of Earhart & Noonan's last takeoff from Lae, New Guinea on the morning of July 2, 1937.
